plot: An enigmatic gang leader known as "The Boss," who is a dead-ringer for Simon, puts "The Saint" under suspicion of murder.
title: The Saint's Double Trouble
plot_es: An enigmatic gang leader known as "The Boss," who is a dead-ringer for Simon, puts "The Saint" under suspicion of murder.
plot_en: An enigmatic gang leader known as "The Boss," who is a dead-ringer for Simon, puts "The Saint" under suspicion of murder.

cast.role: Simon Templar aka The Saint /              'Boss' Duke Bates
cast.name: George Sanders
